org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.io

Class DirectoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.io.DirectoryManager

  • public class DirectoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class helps you to manage directories

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryManager(java.io.File directory)
      Creates a new DirectoryManager instance
      DirectoryManager(java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new DirectoryManager instance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectoryManager clean()
      Cleans all the files and directories inside this directory
      DirectoryManager copy(java.io.File output)
      Copies this directory and its child directories into another directory.
      DirectoryManager copy(java.io.File output, java.io.FileFilter filter)
      Copies this directory and its child directories into another directory.
      DirectoryManager delete()
      Deletes this directory and its child directories if it exists.
      That will also affect all files of them
      DirectoryManager mkdir()
      Creates this directory if it doesn't exist
      DirectoryManager mkdirs()
      Creates this directory and its parent directories if them don't exist
